Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Unitron:




Scattershot raised his weapon, firing off 25 automatic shells at Griplash's 
sternum.

---

Nemesis cursed as he saw the Lavacons changed, and then laughed.  "Dark 
Lavacons?  Wow!  How creative is that!" he raised his weapon, firing off 15 
rapid laser bolts at Astral's abdomen.

===

Unitron checked the scanners.  "This place is so boring.  I should've never 
killed the Newcome--excellent!  A battle.  All shall feel the wrath of 
Unitron, a spawn of Unicron!" the robot yelled, running for the nearest exit.
